message.body: Looks like its gonna pour!

￼A little too Bambi ish
Kitten still hiding
Yeah the painting makes me think of the rudolf cartoon... And yeah she is under the couch. The road is really loud I can see why she would be scared I'm just gonna read atop her
Yep
Pretty fucking classy
She will like it!
What time should I put out wet food
I would just do hard till she is comfortable she likes hard food
Oh really? Cuz I figured the smell would get her from under the couch
You can try
You don't think it will help?
It might
Ok just a little bit!
K
I'm worried! She needs to get out and drink water
Didnt work
Don't worry
I pulled her out of the couch and relocated her to next to the litter box so she would know where it is

She is roaming around on top of the couch but then as a loud bus pulled up outside she went back bellow and she has been staring into marikos room as if she doesn't trust it I may have to move her litter
I think I'll just call her couch cat
Roll some paper wads to see if she will play
She came out to cuddle look into marikos room as if a ghost is in there and go under the couch
Lol it's a start!
And she was under my bed for a while last night pulling on the springs, or I do have a ghost problem ;)
No she is just being status
Statia
But do you think I should move the litter box if she is so untrustly of marikos room right now
Did she use it?
No she won't go in there
Yeah move it to doorway of marikos room
Just did. Doesn't smell in couch but she hasn't come out
Well I'm going to work out so she's all alone
She may explore since your not around to see her do it did you put catnip in toy?
Oh yeah I did
They can hold going to bathroom for a long time
Yeah I pulled everything she owns into the living room so she doesn't have to go far from couch haha
She will be fine by tomorrow
That's a good thing
I can tell its the sounds of traffic so maybe she won't ever try to leave the house
Yup! The old movie today had rape not gonna recommend it
How's contacts? Have they sent you an email on shipment?
Yeah let me forward the emails to you it's confusing one is welcome, the next was confirmation then the last says unable to process
I sent them
You need to call
It's probably credit card number wrong or something
Well you fix it :p
Nope you have all info
I'm not authorized
Mom
It's your prescription and credit card you can handle. This Sarah
I'm not your friend!
If you want them you got to take care of it
:p

All done!
Great! Cat still under couch
Yup
Walked out ran under the couch walked out ran under the couch. Kitten is kind of a pussy
And she got fur all over me. Bloody nose number two today
She smells monikos cat and is afraid its still there! Very dry today with your nose
Yup. Yup she jumped on her spin wheel thing tho so the catnip got her out for a minute
Good start! She's like "I know there's another cat here but dammit where is it"
Haha yeah I swept a lot but it probably needs a good mopping
Their nose is ten times stronger she probably smells two cats ago
Oh they don't like the litter near where they eat
Just like we don't eat in our bathroom
Good!
I was just getti g it all near the couch. She's out again on the couch
The bathroom is fully inspected and I'm being loved
Nice! Now she will be company!
Yeah and she is super cuddly

She's getting more affectionate
Oh very I think right now it's just the you will protect me when that ghost cat comes out. But she was trying to do the cat needing thing and was just scratching my legs as a result
She's got claws
Oh yeah she does and she thinks she can use them to show affection. She ate a little too
Use litter box yet?
No
She will
Especially after adding more food in there. She goes under the couch when I ignore her
She will be owning your apt as hers soon!
Oh I know but at this point she just follows me around its funny like I stood there while she was eating because she would have just followed me back to the living room
She's confused
She's lived here since 6 months old
I'm sure she doesn't remember first apt
Very but ill accept the affection before she turns evil again
Hee hee they made her fur a mess but she does like Oreo
Yup but honestly every time she looks at my I see "thanks for taking away the dogs" on her face
I'm sure she does remember the first time she met the walking cat toy
Ok so it's not that close to bed but reading one of your scary books is probably not my best idea
No scary books at night read river witch not scary and very cool book! She communicates with alligators
But I've already read 10%
Your call

Crazy! Colorado Springs is covered in smoke because of fire near Denver and one near canon city how's your air?
It's crazy hazy here
I don't go outside... It was clear at around 5 I could go outside....
Seems fine here people out jogging and running
Biking
That's good
Stayed up til 2 reading so I could just finish it. Can't sleep any longer sadly. But the sequel is only .99 so I'm gonna get it on kindle if that's ok with the mama

Great!

You know Tim real wood text her right away Cuz he's donating stuff and I have to get ready for work

Yup. It's no big deal I just use stools. A small table and a chair would be nice but I'm sure anything he would have in that department would be large and like you said real wood

Hmmm I will send them an email maybe they deactivated your kindle I will look into it
I bough it with my iPhone because kindle was being gay. I don't have it downloaded anymore an dont feel like doing it
It shows its still pending to deliver to both your iPhone and kindle unplug your router for one minute I know you have a symbol saying you are connected just humor me

Hmmm and you signed in your kindle to their Internet?
My side shows your kindle is actively registered just waiting for connection
Got it!
How?
Oh gotcha glad nothing is wrong with your kindle
The Internet wanted me to accept something first which it didnt ask for until I was yelling at it

Well if they are only 99 cents then you have 18.00 to go
Yeah I'll have to see if its worth it

So I'm slowly deciding if I really like Amanda. She mooches off me, comes over uninvited, and saw my pic on my desk top when my hair was really short and curled and said what was I thinking and it looked really bad. Wtf

Yep they could be too strong break them in half and take half dose
Cheaper that way too
I just took the old ones this morning
K better than nothing
I figured at first I would go back and forth between the two to make it last longer because last time I was home you gave me a brand new bottle almost

￼We're just a couple of no name slobs
I got it from the archive
Been working with chef Ramsey website to help manitou YES!
It would be a cool episode, even if it were just dads restaurants, it's plural in a small town so even if he is bored with cwood he can walk to stagecoach
I think it would be cool
What's the website like? What is it requesting?
I just requested to chef Ramsey that manitou needs his help and willing to let him drama stagecoach or cwood to make it happen
True!
I'm telling you both is what would make the episode we haven't seen the I own two restaurants angle

I don't know if this is real chef but we have two restaurants one fine dining and the other one a family steak house in manitou springs Colorado the last two years we have had major fires that have effected all of our business in our wonderful downtown businesses shopping restaurant and lodging the fires are not near us this time thank goodness but we are hurting as a whole community. Our personal restaurant are craftwoodinn.com and stagecoachinn.com. Chef can visit us we could use chef advice since yeah we have a hippie mentality but mostly as a owner oh miillion plus sales normally via these blasted forest fires we need the great Chef to bring Manitou Springs the confidence it needs to thrive again!
A little hammed so spelling not perfect
Haha you might have wanted to not be hammed but I think it will get the point across good job I was hoping you guys would at least try
Manitou needs it and I will take his shit since he has nice buns
Hammed yes!
It's Easter Sunday isn't it
I have had two dreams recently where the whole family was in the muscatine house
Nancy is doing a sale on all her costumes and I won't be there to snag up any of my cute ones I wore you should go in and snag then
